name: Deception Detection Techniques
description: Methods for identifying deception and manipulation in verbal and written communication.

cards.title: Statement Analysis and Truth Verification
cards.description: Using forensic linguistic techniques to evaluate credibility.
bulletpoints: Identify linguistic patterns associated with deception
Analyze pronoun use, distancing language, and passive voice
Apply forensic statement analysis for investigative interviews

cards.title: Voice Stress and Acoustic Deception Detection
cards.description: Detecting stress-based deception in verbal communication.
bulletpoints: Measure micro-tremors and vocal stress under pressure
Analyze speech hesitation, filler words, and pitch modulation
Use AI-driven voice profiling to assess truthfulness
